[[module css]]
.page_listing{
    transition: box-shadow .3s;
    border: solid 2px white;
    border-radius: 10px;
    padding: 10px;
    margin: 10px;
    text-align: center;
}
.page_listing:hover {
    box-shadow: 0 0 15px white;
}
[[/module]]

[[module CSS]]
:root {
 --borderColor: #FF0000 !important;
 --bgBadgeColor: #DAA520 !important;
}
[[/module]]

[[include :scp-wiki:theme:basalt darkmode=a |wide=a|centertitle=a]]
